section1.title: 1. Purpose of Personal Information Processing
section1.content: Hi Playground is a child-friendly game platform that does not collect personal information. Game progress is stored only on the user's browser and is not transmitted to any server.

section2.title: 2. Personal Information Items Collected
section2.content: Currently, Hi Playground does not collect any personal information. Data such as game scores and progress are stored only on the user's device.

section3.title: 3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
section3.content: Since we do not collect personal information, retention and use periods do not apply. Game data stored in the browser can be deleted by the user at any time.

section4.title: 4. Protection of Children's Personal Information
section4.content: Hi Playground does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. All of our services are designed to be used without collecting personal information.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Local Storage
section5.content: We may use browser local storage to save game progress. This data is stored only on the user's device and is not transmitted to external servers. Users can delete this data at any time through browser settings.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
section6.content: This privacy policy may be updated to add, delete, or modify content in accordance with changes in laws, policies, or security technology. We will notify users of any changes through the site before they take effect.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Service Introduction
section1.content: Hi Playground is a free online game platform for children. These terms apply to all use of Hi Playground services.

section2.title: 2. Terms of Use
section2.item1: Hi Playground is provided as a free service.
section2.item2: No registration or login is required.
section2.item3: A stable internet connection is required to use the service.

section3.title: 3. User Conduct Rules
section3.content: The following acts are prohibited when using the service:

section4.title: 4. Service Provision and Changes
section4.content: Hi Playground may change, suspend, or terminate the service's content, features, games, etc. without prior notice. However, we will make every effort to provide advance notice when suspending or terminating the service.

section5.title: 5. Copyright
section5.content: All content, designs, logos, etc. of Hi Playground are owned by Hi Playground. Users may use content only for personal purposes and may not use it for commercial purposes.

section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
section6.content: Hi Playground is not responsible for any damages arising from the use of the service. The service is provided "as is" and does not guarantee completeness or accuracy.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: These terms may be modified in accordance with changes in laws, policies, or services. If the terms are changed, we will notify users of the changes through the site.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us at:

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Click the start button to begin the game.
Click the large button in the center of the screen to collect energy. Each click increases your energy.
You can purchase automatic energy production upgrades in the shop. For example, "AA Battery" automatically generates energy per second.
You can check your current energy and automatic production per second in the score display.
Game modes: Choose from Infinite Mode, Time Attack (100 million target), or Time Limit (3 minutes) mode.
Upgrade costs increase with each purchase, so it's important to buy them in an efficient order.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: In the early stages, it's key to collect energy by manual clicking first, then quickly purchase automatic production upgrades. Buying cheap automatic upgrades like AA Battery or Home Server first will increase your production per second, allowing energy to continue increasing without manual clicking.

Since upgrade costs increase by 1.25x with each purchase, it's more advantageous in the long run to balance multiple upgrades rather than focusing on just one. For example, it's good to level up Power Glove to about level 5, then switch to automatic production upgrades.
In Time Attack mode, securing fast early production is important. Prioritize early automatic production upgrades, and when you have some room, also level up manual click bonus upgrades.

In Time Limit mode, you need to collect as much energy as possible within 3 minutes, so a balanced upgrade strategy is needed. Since time is limited, it's more effective to buy several reasonably priced upgrades rather than expensive ones.

about.title: About
about.description: Clicker Game is a simple yet addictive reaction speed training game. Through fast clicking and strategic upgrade purchases to efficiently collect energy, you can improve your brain's agility and decision-making abilities. In particular, you can develop logical thinking through resource management strategies using the automatic production system, and feel a sense of achievement through goal setting and achievement. With simple controls that are fun to play, it's an educational game that anyone from elementary school students to adults can easily access.

infinite.name: Infinite Mode
infinite.desc:
Auto-save enabled.
Grow at your own pace.

memory.title: Memory Game
memory.description: Flip cards to find matching pairs!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, cards are displayed face down on the screen.
Click a card to reveal its face, showing a picture or emoji.
You need to find two cards with the same picture and click them consecutively.
When you find a matching pair, the cards are removed and your score increases.
If you select an incorrect pair, the cards flip back and your chances decrease.
Once all card pairs are found, you progress to the next level, and the difficulty gradually increases.
Each level has a time limit, so it's important to quickly judge and remember.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Remembering card positions is key. When flipping the first few cards, focus on their positions rather than the images, and visualize a grid in your mind. For example, remembering "an apple was in the top-left corner" spatially helps you remember longer.

Use a systematic strategy of flipping two cards at a time. When you flip the first card, develop the habit of scanning the remaining cards to find where that image appears again, which saves time. Also, focusing on the same row or column to narrow your search range is effective.

Utilize the combo system. Matching cards consecutively triggers combo bonuses, significantly increasing your score. Practice remembering the positions of the first few cards accurately and clicking quickly to match them consecutively as fast as possible.

At higher levels, time pressure intensifies, so it's important to train both memory and reaction speed simultaneously in early levels. You can aim for high scores by practicing to minimize mistakes and increase accuracy.

about.title: About
about.description: Memory Game is an educational puzzle game that helps improve working memory abilities of the brain. The card matching process utilizes both short-term memory and spatial perception abilities simultaneously, contributing to overall improvement in cognitive abilities. It's particularly effective for training attention and observation skills, and can improve quick judgment and visual processing speed. As levels increase, the number of cards increases and time limits decrease, maintaining a continuous sense of challenge through progressive difficulty increases. It's an excellent learning tool that helps elementary school students' brain development and memory improvement.

math-quiz.title: Elementary Math Master
math-quiz.description: Essential for lower elementary! Fun training for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, math problems appear on the screen.
Problem types include addition, subtraction, multiplication (times tables), division, etc.
Select the correct answer by clicking one of the 4 choices.
Correct answers increase your score and build combos.
Incorrect answers reset your combo and may decrease time.
As levels increase, the number range widens and calculations become more difficult.
Answer as many problems correctly as possible within the time limit to achieve a high score.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Mastering basic calculations quickly is key. Especially if you memorize multiplication tables, you can solve multiplication problems very quickly. Practicing multiplication tables daily will greatly improve your game skills. Also, developing the habit of calculating common patterns like complements of 10 or multiples of 5 first can save time.

Use mental math for simple calculations to find answers immediately, and for complex calculations, use inference to find reasonable answers from the choices. For example, in multiplication problems with large numbers, you can infer the answer by checking the last digit. Also, when dividing by 2 or multiplying by 5, you can quickly find the answer by checking only the last digit.

Maintaining the combo system is important for score increases. Prioritize accuracy and choose carefully for uncertain problems. Consecutive correct answer bonuses greatly affect your score, so focus on accuracy first and gradually increase speed.
To reduce mistakes, proceed with calculations slowly but efficiently in your mind. For example, for problems like 23 + 47, breaking it down step by step (23 + 40 = 63, 63 + 7 = 70) can reduce errors.

about.title: About
about.description: Elementary Math Master is an educational game that can interestingly improve elementary school students' math skills. It naturally trains core arithmetic abilities learned in elementary school, such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, through games. In particular, it gamifies multiplication table memorization, allowing repetitive learning without boredom, and helps develop fast mental arithmetic abilities. The quiz format with time limits improves learners' concentration and cognitive speed, and provides motivation through the combo system. Designed to reduce fear of math and allow enjoyment through games, it greatly helps elementary students improve their basic math skills and form positive attitudes toward mathematics.

start.title: MATH MASTER
start.desc: 60 second time limit! Master the 4 basic operations.

weapon-levelup.title: Weapon Level Up
weapon-levelup.description: Upgrade your weapon at the blacksmith and sell it at the shop!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, you can select a weapon and take it to the blacksmith.
Upgrading a weapon at the blacksmith increases its level and selling price.
Upgrading costs money, and the higher the level, the more the upgrade cost increases significantly.
You can sell upgraded weapons at the shop to earn money.
With the money from sales, you can buy better weapons or further upgrade existing weapons.
You must manage resources while balancing weapon performance and selling price.
The goal is to maximize profit through optimal strategy.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Early on, it's efficient to buy cheap weapons, upgrade them to around level 2-3, then sell them quickly. When capital is low, increasing turnover by trading multiple times helps accumulate large profits. As weapon levels increase, upgrade costs increase exponentially, so selling at appropriate levels early on is good.

When capital is sufficient, consider investing in premium weapons. Premium weapons have high initial costs but large selling price increases when upgraded, allowing larger long-term profits. Especially weapons at level 5 or higher have greatly increased selling prices, so when some capital accumulates, establish strategies centered on premium weapons.

It's important to calculate the ratio of upgrade costs to selling prices to find highly profitable moments. If the cost to raise a weapon one more level is greater than the selling price increase, selling at that point is rational. You can determine optimal selling moments through simple math calculations.

Resource management is key. Rather than blindly raising levels, it's important to create the most efficient investment plan with currently held funds. Focusing on one weapon to quickly create a high level then selling is also effective, rather than managing multiple weapons simultaneously.

about.title: About
about.description: Weapon Level Up is a strategy simulation game that can develop resource management and economic thinking. Through the process of upgrading weapons at the blacksmith and selling them at the shop, you can naturally learn the relationship between investment and profit. Through the game, you can develop the ability to calculate cost-effectiveness and thinking power to make optimal decisions, and experience the importance of resource management. Also, it simultaneously utilizes mathematical calculation abilities and logical reasoning abilities, helping comprehensive brain development. Economic concepts can be easily and enjoyably understood through games, making it a very useful learning tool for elementary school students' economic education and improvement of mathematical thinking.

potion3.name: Shield (50%)
potion3.desc: 50% chance to keep weapon on failure

potion4.name: Steel Protection (80%)
potion4.desc: 80% chance to keep weapon on failure

messages.upgradeFailedProtected: Upgrade failed! But weapon is protected.
messages.storedWeaponEquipped: Upgrade failed.. Equipping stored level {level} weapon.
messages.storeConfirm: Store current weapon (Lv.{level})? Current equipment will be Lv.1.
messages.potionUsed: {name} used! Will apply to next upgrade.

omok.title: Omok Master
omok.description: Place 5 in a row to win! Features ghost stone guide and last move marker.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Place stones alternately on the omok board.
Black starts first, then black and white take turns placing one stone at a time.
You win by placing 5 stones in a row in any direction: horizontal, vertical, or diagonal.
The ghost stone feature allows you to preview where to place your next stone.
The last move is marked with a special indicator for easy game progress tracking.
You must defend when your opponent tries to place forbidden moves like 3-3 (double three) or 4-4 (double four).
Play the game by balancing offense and defense.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: It's good to focus on the center area of the board in the early stages. Starting from the center allows you to create attack paths in all directions, which is advantageous. Also, it's important to place your stones around your opponent's stones to create attack opportunities while also defending. A single stone alone isn't a threat, but when two or more are connected, the danger level increases significantly.

Create attack patterns like 3-3 and 4-4, but if your opponent blocks them, use that to develop attacks in other directions - this is advanced strategy. Rather than focusing on one place, the key is to create simultaneous threats in multiple places, making it difficult for your opponent to defend. Also, launching additional attacks near your opponent's stones that block your 3 or 4 enables chain attacks.

The balance between defense and offense is important. If you only block your opponent's attacks, you'll eventually fail to block one place and lose. Active defense is needed - blocking your opponent's threats while simultaneously creating your own attack opportunities. By placing a stone at a position your opponent must block, you can develop attacks elsewhere while they block that spot.

Learning endgame techniques is important for improving win rate. When you have 4 stones in a row with one end blocked, you can win by placing at the other end. It's important to learn these basic endgame patterns and not miss such opportunities during the game.

about.title: About
about.description: Omok Master is a strategy game that digitally implements the traditional board game Omok. While the rules are simple, it's a game that requires deep strategy, making it very effective for improving strategic thinking and reading ability. Through the game, you can develop logical thinking that involves thinking before acting, and train prediction abilities and situation judgment by understanding and responding to your opponent's intentions. The ghost stone and last move marker features improve game readability, making it easy even for beginners to enjoy, and you can gradually improve your skills. It's a highly educational brain game that simultaneously improves strategic thinking and concentration.

godlike.title: GODLIKE!
godlike.desc: Human victory. You are a legend.

youDied.title: YOU DIED
youDied.desc: The AI's wall was too high...

chess.title: Chess
chess.description: Strategic chess game! Supports 1-player and 2-player modes.

speed-number.title: Speed Number Tap
speed-number.description: Faster than eyes! Tap numbers in order up to 50. Challenge 10 stages with difficulty levels!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, numbers from 1 to 50 are randomly arranged on the screen.
You must find and tap numbers in order starting from 1.
Tapping in the correct order increases your score and progresses to the next number.
Tapping the wrong number results in failure, reducing time or chances.
Finding all numbers in order clears the stage and progresses to the next difficulty level.
As difficulty increases, more numbers appear and time limits become shorter.
The goal is to clear all 10 stages.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Learning number-finding patterns is important. Develop the habit of systematically scanning the screen. For example, maintaining a consistent order like from top-left to right, then moving to the next line reduces missed numbers. Also, repeating and remembering the next number to find in your mind helps reduce mistakes.

Utilize visual memory. Remembering the position briefly after tapping a number helps when searching for similar numbers later. Especially visualizing areas where large numbers (40s, 30s, etc.) are grouped in your mind enables quick searching.

Developing concentration and quick reflexes simultaneously is key. Clicking too fast increases mistakes, so it's good to secure accuracy first, then gradually increase speed. Especially when finding the last numbers (40s), it's important not to click hastily and to check the surroundings once more.

Time management is important in high difficulty. Use the strategy of quickly processing easy numbers (1~10) and spending more time finding large numbers. Also, when you accidentally tap the wrong number, it's necessary to have the mindset to calmly start over without panicking.

about.title: About
about.description: Speed Number Tap is an action game that improves instant judgment and visual processing speed. Through the game, you can simultaneously train number recognition abilities and spatial exploration abilities, and greatly improve concentration and reaction speed. In the process of quickly finding specific numbers among randomly arranged numbers, attention and observation improve, and sequential thinking abilities can also be developed. The structure with increasing difficulty by stage promotes gradual skill improvement, and time limits train the ability to make accurate judgments even in stressful situations. It's a fun and educational game that helps improve elementary school students' visual processing abilities and cognitive speed.

physics-box.title: Physics Box
physics-box.description: Drag, Shoot, and Crash! Knock down the box tower.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: A tower of boxes is displayed on the screen.
Drag the ball with your mouse to pull it, and the trajectory will be shown.
You must launch the ball at the desired angle and force to knock down the box tower.
Clear the stage by removing enough boxes.
You must achieve the goal within the limited number of balls.
Using a physics engine, boxes fall and collide realistically.
The key is to efficiently remove boxes by adjusting the angle and force.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Attacking the base support first is effective. Removing the bottom part of the box tower causes the upper boxes to collapse, removing many boxes in a chain reaction. Especially hitting the center-bottom part of the tower makes the entire structure unstable, dealing great damage.

Adjust the ball's angle and force carefully. Since you can preview the trajectory, it's important to find the angle that can accurately hit the target point. Shooting at an angle close to horizontal can effectively attack the bottom, and shooting at a high angle can hit the top. Practice finding the optimal launch angle for each stage's structure.

Utilize chain reactions. To remove as many boxes as possible with one ball, you must consider the physics effects of boxes colliding and falling. Accurately hitting a specific point to induce a chain collapse can remove many boxes with few balls.

It's important to conserve balls. The fewer balls remaining, the greater the pressure, so it's good to make sure hits in the early stages. Also, finding the weak parts of the box tower and focusing your attack is efficient.

about.title: About
about.description: Physics Box is a destruction simulation game using a physics engine, allowing you to experience physical principles in a fun way. Through the game, you can intuitively understand basic physics concepts such as angles, force, and trajectory, and naturally learn about the principles of object motion and collision. It improves visual problem-solving abilities along with strategic thinking, and trains spatial perception and prediction abilities. By observing object movements similar to reality through the game's physics engine, it stimulates scientific curiosity and develops a learning attitude through experimentation and observation. It's a highly educational game that helps increase elementary school students' scientific thinking and interest in physics.

math-quiz-hard.title: Mental Math Genius
math-quiz-hard.description: Master mixed operations and large numbers.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the upper elementary math quiz, complex math problems appear on the screen.
Problem types include large number arithmetic operations and mixed calculations (addition and multiplication combined, etc.).
You must select the correct answer from 4 choices.
Correct answers significantly increase your score, while incorrect answers deduct chances.
You must accurately apply the order of operations (multiplication and division before addition and subtraction).
There is a time limit, so fast calculation ability is required.
As levels increase, numbers get larger and calculations become more complex.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Understanding the order of operations accurately is most important. In mixed calculation problems, if there are parentheses, calculate inside the parentheses first, then calculate multiplication and division before addition and subtraction. For example, 5 + 3 √ó 2 is 5 + 6 = 11, not 8 √ó 2 = 16. You must firmly imprint these basic principles in your mind.

When calculating large numbers, dividing the calculation into steps can improve both accuracy and speed. For example, 347 + 285 can be calculated as 300 + 200 = 500, 47 + 85 = 132, 500 + 132 = 632 to reduce errors. Also, starting from the last digit to quickly verify is useful.

Use inference strategies using the answer choices. You can find a reasonable answer without calculating all choices. For example, in multiplication of large numbers, you can check only the last digit or compare approximate sizes to first exclude obviously wrong answers.

It's important to improve calculation speed through continuous practice. Practicing a little each day to become familiar with large number calculations will make the calculation process automatically proceed in your mind, greatly saving time.

about.title: About
about.description: Mental Math Genius (Upper Elementary) is an advanced math learning game for upper elementary school students. It's designed to raise mathematical thinking ability one level through large number operations and mixed calculations. Through the game, you can naturally learn the principles of order of operations and develop the ability to solve complex calculation problems. The quiz format with time limits improves cognitive processing speed and simultaneously trains logical thinking and problem-solving abilities. It's a highly educational game that helps solidify the foundation of mathematics and prepares the groundwork for future middle school math learning.

start.title: Mental Math Genius
start.desc: Advanced challenge! Pay attention to multiplication and division order.

gravity-run.title: Gravity Run: Zero
gravity-run.description: Defy gravity! Tap to flip up and down. Experience extreme speed.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, the character automatically begins running.
Touch or click the screen to change gravity (from top to bottom, or bottom to top).
You must run as far as possible while avoiding obstacles.
If you hit an obstacle, the game ends and your final distance is recorded.
Focus is required to control a character moving at high speed.
Accurately timing gravity flips is key to survival.
Challenge yourself to improve your skills and set new records.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Gravity flip timing is crucial. Rather than reacting immediately upon seeing an obstacle, it's better to flip slightly ahead by considering the distance to the obstacle and your speed. Flipping too early may cause you to hit the next obstacle, and flipping too late will make you hit the current one. It's important to find the optimal timing through experience.

Maintain a wide field of view. It's important to understand the obstacle distribution across the entire screen, not just focus on the character in the center. By checking and preparing for upcoming obstacles in advance, you can respond with ease. Especially for obstacles that appear consecutively, rapid consecutive flips are needed, so you must identify them in advance.

Pattern learning is important. By repeatedly playing the same sections and learning obstacle placement patterns, you can efficiently pass through those sections. Although there are slight random elements each time, understanding the overall patterns allows for faster responses.
Maintaining focus is key. As the game goes on, it's easy to lose focus, but a single mistake can end the game. It's also a method to take regular breaks while playing or to play in short sessions.

about.title: About
about.description: Gravity Run: Zero is an action running game where you manipulate gravity to avoid obstacles, significantly improving reaction speed and instant judgment. Through the game, you can train visual processing speed and motor control abilities, and develop the ability to make accurate judgments even in high-speed situations. Although the operation is simple (flipping gravity), you must respond to rapidly changing situations, so concentration and cognitive flexibility improve. Through the game, you can train to push your brain's reaction speed and processing ability to the limit, and also develop psychological stability to make calm judgments even in stressful situations. It's a fun and challenging action game that helps improve elementary school students' quick reflexes and concentration.

start.title: GRAVITY RUN
start.desc:
Lv.40+ Elite obstacles appear!
Purple obstacles move.

infinite-space.title: Infinite Space: Rogue
infinite-space.description: Endless space war! Gather EXP and evolve your ship with roguelike skills.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: The player's spaceship is positioned at the center bottom of the screen.
Move your mouse and the spaceship will follow.
The spaceship automatically fires bullets to attack enemies.
Destroying enemy spaceships gives you EXP and score.
Collecting EXP levels you up, and you can choose ability enhancements.
Ability enhancements include various options such as attack power increase, fire rate increase, health recovery, etc.
Taking enemy attacks decreases your health, and when health reaches 0, the game ends.
It's an endlessly progressing game where you challenge for the highest score.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Early leveling is important. Quickly defeating the first few enemies to reach level 2-3 quickly allows you to choose ability enhancement options, greatly increasing survivability. Not dying early and collecting EXP is key to extending the game.

Ability enhancement selection determines victory or defeat. Balancing attack power increases and fire rate increases allows you to quickly defeat enemies and gain more EXP. Also, occasionally selecting health recovery abilities to maintain survivability is important. Creating a balanced build is better than focusing on just one ability.

Avoiding enemy bullets is key to survival. Understand and predict enemy attack patterns to move. Especially in sections where many enemies appear, it's important to check the entire screen and move to safe spaces. Securing your own safety first before attacking is the way to survive longer, rather than blindly chasing enemies.

Learn enemy spawn patterns. As the game progresses, enemy types and attack patterns become more diverse, but understanding basic patterns makes responses easier. Understand the characteristics of fast-moving enemies and slow but multi-bullet-firing enemies, and use appropriate response strategies for each.

about.title: About
about.description: Infinite Space: Rogue is a shooting game combining roguelike elements, an action game that simultaneously trains strategic thinking and reaction speed. Through the game, you can improve visual attention and multitasking abilities, and develop response capabilities to rapidly changing situations. In the process of strategic decision-making through ability enhancement selection, logical thinking and planning abilities improve, and in the process of understanding and responding to enemy patterns, observation and prediction abilities develop. Through the game, you can train concentration and endurance, and increase challenge spirit and achievement motivation. It's a fun and educational shooting game that helps improve elementary school students' cognitive abilities and reaction speed.

mystic-fortune.title: Mystic Fortune
mystic-fortune.description: Check your daily fortune whispered by the stars.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, a screen for entering your name and birth date is displayed.
After entering your name and birth date (year, month, day), click the "Check Fortune" button.
Your zodiac sign is automatically determined based on your birth date, and your fortune is generated by combining it with today's date.
On the fortune results screen, you can check your overall fortune, love fortune, and money fortune.
You can also check your lucky color and lucky number.
Click the "Check Another Fortune" button to return to the input screen and check fortunes with different information.
A new fortune is provided daily, and even with the same birth date, you can check different fortunes depending on the date.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: This game is not for competition or scoring, but for healing and relaxation. The purpose is to read positive messages and make your mind feel comfortable.
Try creating a habit of checking your fortune every morning to start the day positively. A small positive message can affect your mood for the entire day.
It's important to use fortunes as a reference only, and make actual decisions based on your own judgment and plans. Enjoy the fun and relaxation through the game.
You can also check fortunes with family or friends' birth dates and spend enjoyable time together.

about.title: About
about.description: Mystic Fortune is a lifestyle game for daily relaxation and healing. By entering your name and birth date, you can check today's fortune based on your zodiac sign. Along with overall fortune, love fortune, and money fortune, lucky colors and numbers are also provided to help you start the day positively. Through the game, you can maintain a positive mindset and learn ways to find small joys. By checking new messages daily, you can add small changes and expectations to your daily life, providing psychological stability and relaxation. It's a healing game that helps find small joys and recharge positive energy in modern society full of stress. These results are for entertainment purposes only and have no scientific basis. Please enjoy with a light heart.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, a rabbit, carrot, and command blocks are displayed.
Place command blocks (forward, right, left, etc.) in order to program the rabbit to reach the carrot.
Click command blocks to add them in execution order.
Click the "Run" button and the rabbit will move according to the programmed commands.
When the rabbit reaches the carrot, you clear the stage and proceed to the next level.
As levels increase, more complex command combinations are needed.
Advanced concepts such as loops and conditionals can be learned progressively.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Break down problems step by step to solve them. It's important to first identify the movements needed for the rabbit to reach the carrot, then place the necessary commands in order. For example, thinking in steps like "3 spaces forward, right, 2 spaces forward" makes it easy to solve.

Utilize repeating patterns. When the same action needs to be repeated multiple times, using loop blocks can make code concise. For example, if "forward 5 times" is needed, using a loop block is efficient. Develop the habit of first checking if there's a pattern when solving problems.

Simulate in your mind before execution. After placing command blocks, if you mentally follow how the rabbit will move, you can solve problems without mistakes. Especially, accurately calculating direction changes and movement distances is important.

Gradually challenge complex problems. It's good to learn advanced concepts like loops and conditionals after perfectly understanding basic commands (forward, rotate). It's important to fully understand and become familiar with each concept before moving to the next step.

about.title: About
about.description: Code Rabbit is an educational game that allows you to learn coding logic easily and enjoyably through games. Through block-based programming, even elementary school students can learn basic coding concepts without burden. Through the game, you can improve sequential thinking, logical reasoning, and problem-solving abilities, and naturally develop algorithmic thinking. You can visually and intuitively understand basic programming principles such as command order, repetition, and conditions, making it very effective for laying the foundation for future actual programming language learning. It's a highly educational game that allows you to enjoyably develop Computational Thinking, an essential 21st-century skill.

fail.title: Failed :(
fail.msg: Fell into water or hit something.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Control the cannon at the bottom of the screen with your mouse to set the angle.
Bubbles with English words float at the top of the screen.
You must fire alphabet bubbles from the cannon to complete words.
When you match the letters of a word in order, that word is completed and removed.
Points are awarded based on completed words, with longer words earning higher scores.
You must complete words before the bubbles fall down.
The game ends when bubbles reach the bottom of the screen.
Enjoy learning various English words while playing the game.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: It's important to match letters from the first letter of the word in order. When multiple words are on screen, use a strategy to prioritize completing the longest word or the word with the highest score. Also, prioritizing quickly falling words to prevent game over is key.

Cannon angle adjustment determines accuracy. Practice identifying the exact position of target bubbles and estimating the firing trajectory to find the optimal angle. Especially, high angles are needed to hit bubbles at the top, and low angles are sufficient for nearby bubbles. Developing angle sense through practice greatly improves accuracy.

A strategy of working on multiple words simultaneously is effective. You can efficiently use time by matching a few letters of one word, then working on another word, and returning to complete the first word. However, working on too many words at once can be confusing, so working on 2-3 words simultaneously is appropriate.

Link English word learning with the game. You can naturally learn English word spelling while playing, so if an unknown word appears, learning its meaning together doubles the learning effect. Learning patterns of frequently appearing words allows you to quickly recognize and complete them.

about.title: About
about.description: Word Pop is an educational game combining English word learning with action gameplay. Through the game, you can enjoyably learn English word spelling while simultaneously improving visual memory and motor control abilities. Through the game, familiarity with English words increases, and you can naturally memorize spelling, making it very effective for English learning. Especially for young learners, learning English enjoyably through games instead of boring memorization increases learning motivation and encourages continuous learning. It's a highly educational game that allows simultaneous English learning and brain development.

start.title: WORD POP
start.subtitle: EXTREME
start.desc:
Missing the answer costs lives!
Fever mode is safe.
Block the pouring words.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, jellies are ready to fall on the screen.
Touch or click the screen to drop a jelly from the top.
Move your mouse or drag your finger to adjust where the jelly will fall.
When two jellies of the same number (tier) collide, they automatically merge into a larger jelly.
Merging jellies gives you points and experience (XP). Points increase based on the size of the jelly.
Collecting XP levels you up, and when you level up, you can choose one of 3 skills.
When jellies exceed the "DEAD LINE" at the top of the screen, a warning is displayed, and if it lasts more than 3 seconds, it's game over.
Efficiently merge jellies to record the highest score possible!

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Jelly placement strategy is key. Placing jellies of the same number close together makes merging easier. Especially, merging small jellies (2, 4, 8) first to create large jellies, then merging those large jellies again is effective for gradually increasing size. Rather than randomly dropping them, understand the positions of jellies and place them strategically.

Skill selection determines victory or defeat. The "Clean" skill is useful for removing small jellies at once to secure space, and the "Gravity" skill helps prevent jellies from exceeding the deadline in crisis situations. The "Bomb" skill removes nearby jellies to create space and earn points, making it very useful. It's important to choose skills appropriate for the situation.

Deadline management is key to survival. When jellies start gathering near the deadline, you must respond immediately. The "Shake" skill shakes jellies to disperse them, or the "Diet" skill reduces jelly size to secure space, both are effective. It's important to always maintain spare space so jellies don't exceed the deadline.

XP management is important. The larger the jelly you merge, the more XP you get, so continuously merging small jellies to create large ones speeds up leveling. As levels increase, larger jellies can appear immediately, so leveling up quickly helps you play longer.

about.title: About
about.description: Jelly Legend is a physics engine-based jelly merging puzzle game, a unique game combining roguelike elements. Through the game, you can improve strategic thinking and spatial perception abilities, and develop quick judgment and timing sense. Through realistic jelly movement using a physics engine, scientific curiosity is stimulated, and mathematical thinking (the concept of multiples of 2) can be naturally learned through the process of merging jellies. Through the roguelike skill system, you can try different strategies each game, giving it high replay value, and it can improve challenge spirit and problem-solving abilities. It's a game that requires simple controls but deep strategy, a highly educational game that helps elementary school students' brain development and logical thinking improvement.

start.title: JELLY LEGEND
start.desc:
Touch the screen to drop jellies.
Merge same jellies to make them bigger!
Level up to get powerful skills.

gravity.title: Zero Gravity
gravity.desc: Gravity weakens for 10 seconds, jellies float

bomb.title: Bomb
bomb.desc: Next jelly becomes a bomb that explodes on contact

shake.title: Earthquake
shake.desc: Shakes screen strongly to mix jellies

next_big.title: Big Gift
next_big.desc: Next jelly appears one tier larger

neon-beat.title: Neon Beat
neon-beat.description: Cyberpunk Rhythm Action with 20 tracks & 3 modes.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, one of 20 EDM tracks is randomly selected.
Watch for neon notes rising from the bottom of the screen. Each note corresponds to a specific key.
4-key mode: Use D, F, J, K keys.
6-key mode: Use S, D, F, J, K, L keys.
8-key mode: Use A, S, D, F, H, J, K, L keys.
Press the corresponding key when the note reaches the judgment line at the top to score points.
Perfect judgments give you the highest score, while Miss judgments break your combo.
Maintaining combos gives you bonus points.
Try to get as many Perfect judgments as possible until the song ends to record a high score.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Learning rhythm sense is key. Notes fall according to each song's BPM (beats per minute), so practice pressing keys in time with the music's beat. It's good to start with slow BPM songs and gradually challenge faster songs. Especially, understanding 4/4 time and 16-beat rhythm greatly improves judgment.

Keyboard posture is important. Place your fingers on the keys beforehand and prepare before notes reach the judgment line. Especially in 6-key or 8-key modes, practice placing both hands symmetrically for quick reactions. Don't raise your wrists too high and maintain a natural posture, which helps with long play sessions.

Understand the judgment line accurately. Pressing the key when the note exactly touches the judgment line gives you Perfect judgment. Pressing too early or too late results in Good or Miss judgment, so practice remembering the judgment line's position and matching timing accurately. Especially when consecutive notes appear, it's important to maintain rhythm and press keys at consistent intervals.

Maintaining combos is key to high scores. Missing judgment breaks your combo and loses bonus points, so it's important to press keys at accurate timing rather than uncertain notes. Also, practice identifying the order and quickly handling when multiple notes fall simultaneously. In high-difficulty songs, finger independence and speed are important.

about.title: About
about.description: Neon Beat is a cyberpunk-themed rhythm action game that can be enjoyed with 20 EDM tracks using procedural music generation technology. Through the game, you can improve rhythm sense and musical sensitivity, and develop fast reaction speed and finger accuracy. With 4-key, 6-key, and 8-key modes to adjust difficulty, it can be enjoyed by beginners to experts, and you can experience different BPMs and styles in each song, providing excellent variety. Through the game, you can improve concentration and multitasking abilities, and provide a unique experience combining music and games. Especially through procedural music generation technology, you can experience slightly different music each play, giving it high replay value. It's a highly educational game that helps elementary school students who like rhythm games improve their musical sense and reaction speed.

guardian-defense.title: Guardian Defense
guardian-defense.description: Tower Defense meets Roguelike. Draft cards to build your defense.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, the path enemies will move along is displayed on the map.
Select a tower from the tower slots at the bottom of the screen, then place it in an empty space on the map.
There are 6 tower types: Archer (basic), Cannon (area attack), Ballista (air only), Ice (speed reduction), Thunder (chain attack), Sniper (long range).
Enemies automatically attack when they enter a tower's range.
Defeating enemies gives you gold, and you can use gold to upgrade towers or buy new towers.
Clearing a wave shows a card draft screen where you can choose one of 3 cards.
Cards provide various effects such as acquiring towers, buff enhancements, gold/life gains, etc.
When enemies reach the target point, life decreases, and when life reaches 0, it's game over.
The goal is to clear all 20 waves.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Tower placement determines victory or defeat. It's effective to place towers along enemy paths, especially at curves or long straight sections. Especially placing strong towers at positions where the path passes multiple times allows efficient attacks across multiple waves. Place many Archer towers early to build a basic defense line, and place Cannons at points where enemies gather to utilize area attacks.

Tower combinations are important. Ice towers slowing enemy speed allows other towers to attack more, significantly increasing total damage. Also, Thunder towers attack multiple enemies simultaneously, so placing them at sections where enemies gather is effective. Ballistas are specialized for quickly defeating air enemies, so place them in preparation for waves with many air enemies.

Card selection strategy is key. Early on, selecting tower cards to build a defense line is effective, and from the mid-game, selecting buff cards (attack power, attack speed, range increase) to strengthen existing towers is effective. Especially attack power and attack speed enhancements apply to all towers, making them very useful. Gold or life cards are good to select in crisis situations.

Resource management is important. Early on, build a defense line with cheap Archer towers, and save gold to place strong towers from the mid-game. Upgrading towers is as important as buying new towers, so prioritize upgrading towers at key positions. Also, placing towers appropriate for enemy types (ground/air) is efficient.

about.title: About
about.description: Guardian Defense is a strategy game combining tower defense and roguelike elements. Through the game, you can improve strategic thinking and resource management abilities, and develop situation judgment and planning skills. Understanding 6 diverse tower types and their characteristics and appropriately combining them improves logical thinking, and through the card draft system, you can try different strategies each game, giving it high replay value. Through the game, you can improve spatial perception and prediction abilities, and problem-solving abilities develop through the process of building optimal defense lines with limited resources. Especially as waves progress, difficulty increases, maintaining a continuous sense of challenge, and you can feel the achievement of completing 20 waves. It's a highly educational game that helps elementary school students' strategic thinking and planning abilities.

emoji-survivor.title: Emoji Survivor
emoji-survivor.description: Survive the emoji horde! Action Roguelike.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, the player appears as a wizard emoji (üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è) in the center of the screen.
You can move the player using WASD keys or the virtual joystick at the bottom left of the screen.
Enemies continue to spawn from the edges of the screen and swarm towards the player. Contact with enemies causes continuous damage.
Defeating enemies drops experience gems (üíé), which are automatically collected when you get close. Gems are magnetically attracted to the player within a certain distance.
Collecting experience levels you up, and upon leveling up, you can choose one of three weapon/ability cards.

Weapon types: Magic Missile (‚ú®) - Fires at nearest enemy, Rotating Axe (ü™ì) - Area attack, Garlic Aura (üßÑ) - Continuous damage to nearby enemies, Lightning (‚ö°) - Instant damage to random enemy, Shoes (üëü) - Increases movement speed.
Selecting the same weapon multiple times increases its level, enhancing damage and effects.
You can check HP, level, experience, survival time, and kill count at the top of the screen.
When HP reaches 0, it's game over. The goal is to survive as long as possible.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Early on, it's important to select Magic Missile to secure basic attack power. Magic Missile automatically targets the nearest enemy, providing stable damage. As the level increases, cooldown decreases and damage increases, so quickly leveling up early is key.

Garlic Aura is an aura-type weapon that continuously damages nearby enemies. It's very effective when many enemies swarm, and as the level increases, range and damage increase. It's especially effective when enemies gather around the player, so it's recommended to select it early.

Rotating Axe is a weapon capable of area attacks, allowing you to attack multiple enemies simultaneously. As the level increases, the number of axes fired simultaneously increases, allowing you to defeat more enemies. It's particularly useful after the mid-game when many enemies swarm.

Lightning is a weapon that instantly deals powerful damage to random enemies. It's effective for quickly defeating bosses or strong enemies, and as the level increases, the number of lightning strikes increases simultaneously. However, stability is somewhat lower due to random targeting.

Shoes are a passive ability that increases movement speed. Faster movement makes it easier to avoid enemies and collect gems faster. Movement becomes increasingly important as more enemies appear, so it's good to select it after the mid-game.

Learn enemy types. Zombies (üßü) are basic enemies, Bats (ü¶á) are fast but weak enemies, Skeletons (üíÄ) are strong but slow enemies, Ghosts (üëª) are medium difficulty, and Bosses (üëπ) are very strong enemies. As time passes, enemy HP increases and spawn speed also increases, so you must continuously upgrade weapons.

Minimizing contact with enemies is key to survival. It's important to defeat enemies before they approach, or maintain distance while moving when there are many enemies. Utilizing area attack weapons like Garlic Aura allows you to defeat enemies without contact.

When leveling up, choose weapons that match the current situation. If there are many enemies, choose area attack weapons (Garlic Aura, Rotating Axe), and if a boss appears, choose powerful single-target weapons (Lightning). Also, leveling up existing weapons is as important as selecting new ones.

about.title: About
about.description: Emoji Survivor is a Vampire Survivors-style survivor action roguelike game. It features unique visuals composed of various enemies and weapons expressed as emojis, and you can enjoy intense action with simple controls. Through the game, you can improve reaction speed and situational judgment, and develop strategic thinking through weapon combinations and selection. The infinite survival system where difficulty increases over time maintains continuous challenge, and you can try different weapon combinations each game, giving it high replay value. The game helps with stress relief and concentration improvement, and you can develop quick decision-making and multitasking abilities. You can feel a sense of achievement in the process of defeating enemies and leveling up, and the goal of surviving as long as possible improves patience and concentration. It's an educational game that helps improve elementary school students' reaction speed training and strategic thinking.

axe.name: Rotating Axe
axe.desc: Throws axe in air for area attack

idle-factory.title: Idle Factory
idle-factory.description: Automation management game! Build production lines and upgrade your growing factory. Challenge 30 stages!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Click the "GAME START" button to begin the game. Initial gold of 100 is provided.
You can purchase production lines from the left "‚öôÔ∏è Production Line" panel. Each production line automatically generates gold.
You can raise production line levels from the right "‚¨ÜÔ∏è Upgrade" panel. Upgrading increases production power by the level amount.
Clicking the click area at the top gives you additional gold. Consecutive clicks build combos, increasing bonuses.
Each production line has a 5% chance to trigger a critical, tripling production. A "‚≠ê CRITICAL!" indicator appears on screen.
You can invest gold from the right "üíº Investment" panel for a 50% chance to earn 2x profit or take a loss. After investing, an "Investing..." state is maintained for 60 seconds.
Check the goal amount in the "üìä Stage Info" at the top right. When the goal amount is reached, the "Next Stage" button is activated.
When clearing a stage, only 10% of gold carries over to the next stage, so proceed to the next stage carefully.
Completing all 30 stages completes the game!

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Early strategy: First purchase 1 "Worker" with the initial gold of 100. Upgrading may be more efficient than purchasing multiple production lines.
Fund management: When reaching about 80% of the goal amount, consider saving for the next stage rather than upgrading. Be careful as 90% of gold disappears when clearing a stage.

Upgrade strategy: The more production lines you have, the greater the effect of upgrades. As levels increase, upgrade costs increase exponentially, so balancing upgrades across multiple production lines is also a good strategy.
Production line selection: Early stages focus on Workers and Machines, mid-game on Robots and Factories, late game on Plants and Complexes, and final stages focus on Megacorps, Towers, and Cities.
Critical utilization: The more production lines you have, the higher the critical frequency. Criticals are unpredictable but greatly help increase production.

Investment strategy: Investment has high risk but allows quick gold acquisition. Utilizing investment when close to the goal amount enables quick clearing, but failure results in large losses, so decide carefully. The investing state lasts 60 seconds, so timing is important.
Click system: Actively clicking earns additional gold. Consecutive clicks build combos and increase bonuses, so clicking to collect gold until production lines are built is also a good method.

Stage-by-stage strategy: Stages 1-5 are quick clears, Stages 6-10 build mid-tier production lines, Stages 11-15 balance advanced production lines and upgrades, Stages 16-20 focus investment on premium production lines, Stages 21-25 require mega production lines, Stages 26-30 require optimized strategy and patience.

about.title: About
about.description: Idle Factory is an automation management simulation game where you operate a growing factory by building and upgrading production lines. The goal is to build 12 diverse production lines (from workers to space scale) and clear 30 stages. Through the game, you can develop resource management and strategic thinking, and improve luck-based elements and risk management abilities through critical and investment systems. Production lines automatically generate gold, so the game progresses without clicking, but you can earn additional gold by actively clicking or investing, allowing you to enjoy various play styles. As stages increase, goal amounts increase exponentially, providing challenging difficulty, and especially Stages 26-30 require optimized strategy and patience due to nearly impossible difficulty. Through the game, you can improve long-term planning and resource management abilities, and feel achievement each time you clear a stage. It's an educational game that anyone from elementary students to adults can easily access while providing deep strategic elements.

ui.invested: invested. Result will be available in
ui.notEnoughGold: Not enough gold to invest! (Minimum 1G required)

start.desc:
Automation management game!
Build production lines and upgrade
Clear 30 stages!

lucky-toast.title: Lucky Toast
lucky-toast.description: Expand slots, hire staff, and handle random events!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, you have 1 slot and $100 initial money.
Click the "Cook" button on a slot to start cooking toast. When it's ready, a "Serve" button appears.
When customers are in the queue, click the "Serve" button to serve toast and receive money.
There are 4 types of toast: Burnt Toast ($0), Normal Toast ($5), Special Toast ($25), and Rainbow Toast ($150).
Click the lock icon next to a slot and pay the cost to add more slots.
Hiring staff automates a slot to automatically cook and serve toast. Hiring staff increases rent permanently.

Random events occur during the day: Golden Time (income x2), Blackout (cannot cook/serve), Critic Visit (next toast price x5), Health Inspection (fine $50), Impatient Customer (patience decreases) etc.
When the timer at the top reaches 0, the day ends. At the end of each day, you must pay rent.
When a customer's patience reaches 0, they leave and you lose 1 life. When lives reach 0, it's game over.
The goal is to survive as many days as possible and set a high score.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Early strategy: Quickly cook and serve toast with the first slot to accumulate funds. Early on, Normal Toast appears most frequently, providing stable income.
Slot expansion: It's important to secure the second slot ($200) as soon as possible. More slots allow you to make more toast simultaneously, greatly increasing income.
Staff hiring: Hiring staff automates slots to cook toast without manual work, but increases rent permanently. Hiring staff when operating multiple slots greatly increases efficiency.

Upgrade selection: Spicy Sauce increases prices by 50% but increases burnt toast probability. Safety First completely prevents burnt toast but slows cooking speed. Gambler's Fan increases jackpot probability but prevents normal toast.

Event response: During Golden Time, utilize all slots to maximize income (x2). During blackouts, customers wait, so serve quickly after the blackout ends. When a critic visits, it's a good strategy to wait a bit to make the next toast as expensive as possible.
Fund management: Always maintain enough funds to pay rent. If you can't pay rent, it's game over. It's important to keep reserve funds for health inspection events ($50).

Customer management: Serve toast before customer patience runs out. When many customers gather, operating multiple slots simultaneously to serve quickly is important. Service Candy upgrade increases customer patience and helps.
Risk management: Upgrades like Gambler's Fan or Spicy Sauce provide high returns but carry risk. If you prefer stable play, choosing Safety First is good.

about.title: About
about.description: Lucky Toast is a management simulation game where you operate a toast shop. The goal is to expand the shop by adding more slots, hire staff, handle random events, and satisfy customers to operate as long as possible. Toast cooking results are determined by probability, and if you're lucky enough to make a Rainbow Toast, you can earn large profits. Through the game, you can develop resource management and quick judgment skills, and improve strategic thinking by considering the balance between risk and profit. The random event system helps develop response abilities in unpredictable situations, and improves time management and multitasking skills. Through the game, you can feel the fun and challenge of management, and gain a sense of achievement from achieving high scores. It's an educational game that everyone from elementary students to adults can easily enjoy while providing deep strategic elements.

memory.title: Memory Game
memory.description: Flip cards to find matching pairs!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: When you start the game, cards are displayed face down on the screen.
Click a card to reveal its face, showing a picture or emoji.
You need to find two cards with the same picture and click them consecutively.
When you find a matching pair, the cards are removed and your score increases.
If you select an incorrect pair, the cards flip back and your chances decrease.
Once all card pairs are found, you progress to the next level, and the difficulty gradually increases.
Each level has a time limit, so it's important to quickly judge and remember.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Remembering card positions is key. When flipping the first few cards, focus on their positions rather than the images, and visualize a grid in your mind. For example, remembering "an apple was in the top-left corner" spatially helps you remember longer.

Use a systematic strategy of flipping two cards at a time. When you flip the first card, develop the habit of scanning the remaining cards to find where that image appears again, which saves time. Also, focusing on the same row or column to narrow your search range is effective.

Utilize the combo system. Matching cards consecutively triggers combo bonuses, significantly increasing your score. Practice remembering the positions of the first few cards accurately and clicking quickly to match them consecutively as fast as possible.

At higher levels, time pressure intensifies, so it's important to train both memory and reaction speed simultaneously in early levels. You can aim for high scores by practicing to minimize mistakes and increase accuracy.

about.title: About
about.description: Memory Game is an educational puzzle game that helps improve working memory abilities of the brain. The card matching process utilizes both short-term memory and spatial perception abilities simultaneously, contributing to overall improvement in cognitive abilities. It's particularly effective for training attention and observation skills, and can improve quick judgment and visual processing speed. As levels increase, the number of cards increases and time limits decrease, maintaining a continuous sense of challenge through progressive difficulty increases. It's an excellent learning tool that helps elementary school students' brain development and memory improvement.

start.title: Memory Master
start.desc: Match all card pairs before time runs out!

help.title: How to Play
help.desc:
1. Flip cards to find matching pairs.
2. Wrong matches will flip back.
3. Find all pairs before time runs out to win!

chess.title: Chess Master: Hell Mode
chess.description: Grandmaster-level AI from Round 1. Extreme chess with positional tactics.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: Chess is played with white and black pieces, and you always play as white.

Each piece has unique movement rules: Pawns move forward 1 square (2 on first move), Rooks move in straight lines, Knights move in L-shapes, Bishops move diagonally, Queens move in all directions, and Kings move one square at a time.
The goal is to checkmate the opponent's King. The game ends when the King is in check and cannot escape.
Special rules include: En passant (pawn captures diagonally), Castling (king and rook move together), and Pawn promotion (pawn becomes another piece when reaching the end).
The game consists of 12 rounds. Clearing each round advances to the next. Clearing all rounds earns the Grandmaster title.
The AI uses positional tactics (PST - Piece Square Tables) to play at grandmaster level.
Game progress is automatically saved, so you can continue playing anytime.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Control the center. Controlling the central 4 squares (e4, e5, d4, d5) is fundamental. Center control increases piece mobility and attack options. In the opening, use pawns to occupy the center and advance knights and bishops to central positions.

Think about piece harmony. Each piece must work together. Knights are powerful when combined with bishops, and rooks and queens are effective on open files. Don't isolate pieces; position them to support each other.

Secure your King's safety. In the opening, castle to protect your King. Maintain pawn structure in front of the King for defense. In the endgame, the King can be used offensively, but always prioritize safety.

Minimize mistakes and understand the AI's weaknesses. The AI isn't perfect and can make slight mistakes. Observe the AI's attack patterns and recognize recurring sequences to find counter-strategies. It's more important to play practical, solid moves than to calculate deeply.

about.title: About
about.description: Chess Master: Hell Mode is a chess game that pushes strategic thinking and planning abilities to the extreme. This game pits you against grandmaster-level AI from Round 1, providing a very challenging experience for elementary school students. Through the Positional Tactics (PST) system, the AI accurately evaluates each piece's positional value to find optimal moves. The game helps improve logical thinking, pattern recognition, and long-term planning skills, while fostering a growth mindset of learning from failures. The challenge of clearing all 12 rounds develops perseverance and patience, and the ability to solve complex problems step by step. Chess is a strategic board game with thousands of years of history, scientifically proven to enhance brain development and cognitive abilities.

physics-box.title: Physics Box
physics-box.description: Drag, Shoot, and Crash! Knock down the box tower.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
steps: A tower of boxes is displayed on the screen.
Drag the ball with your mouse to pull it, and the trajectory will be shown.
You must launch the ball at the desired angle and force to knock down the box tower.
Clear the stage by removing enough boxes.
You must achieve the goal within the limited number of balls.
Using a physics engine, boxes fall and collide realistically.
The key is to efficiently remove boxes by adjusting the angle and force.

strategy.title: Strategy & Tips
tips: Attacking the base support first is effective. Removing the bottom part of the box tower causes the upper boxes to collapse, removing many boxes in a chain reaction. Especially hitting the center-bottom part of the tower makes the entire structure unstable, dealing great damage.

Adjust the ball's angle and force carefully. Since you can preview the trajectory, it's important to find the angle that can accurately hit the target point. Shooting at an angle close to horizontal can effectively attack the bottom, and shooting at a high angle can hit the top. Practice finding the optimal launch angle for each stage's structure.

Utilize chain reactions. To remove as many boxes as possible with one ball, you must consider the physics effects of boxes colliding and falling. Accurately hitting a specific point to induce a chain collapse can remove many boxes with few balls.

It's important to conserve balls. The fewer balls remaining, the greater the pressure, so it's good to make sure hits in the early stages. Also, finding the weak parts of the box tower and focusing your attack is efficient.

about.title: About
about.description: Physics Box is a destruction simulation game using a physics engine, allowing you to experience physical principles in a fun way. Through the game, you can intuitively understand basic physics concepts such as angles, force, and trajectory, and naturally learn about the principles of object motion and collision. It improves visual problem-solving abilities along with strategic thinking, and trains spatial perception and prediction abilities. By observing object movements similar to reality through the game's physics engine, it stimulates scientific curiosity and develops a learning attitude through experimentation and observation. It's a highly educational game that helps increase elementary school students' scientific thinking and interest in physics.

control.title: Controls
control.desc:
Drag the ball back to shoot.
Drag on empty screen to scout the map.

victory.title: Victory
victory.desc: Destroy 70% or more of all boxes to unlock the next stage.
